channel.title: Short question
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
wanna put my server on moparscape serverlist, so i did. when i did registreded server, it says;
Your server will now be checked by logging into it with the following credentials: Username: 583T Password: PGNXtP9 to make sure it is online, and if successful, it will be posted. You must register this username and password for me on your server and allow it to be logged into from the IP 69.39.224.55 The server will be deleted from the queue if not verified and logged into within 24 hours of posting.
Does it mean, i need to let my server online, and allow this name and pass and ip? or does it mean i need to log in?

item.title: Short question
item.dc:creator: @elvemaqe elvemaqe
item.description:
@elvemaqe wrote:

k thanks, then problem solved:P

Read full topic

item.title: Short question
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Just leave your server online

Read full topic

item.title: Short question

item.description:
@elvemaqe wrote:

Hi everyone,

wanna put my server on moparscape serverlist, so i did.
when i did registreded server, it says;

Your server will now be checked by logging into it with the following credentials:
Username: 583T
Password: PGNXtP9
to make sure it is online, and if successful, it will be posted.
You must register this username and password for me on your server and allow it to be logged into from the IP 69.39.224.55
The server will be deleted from the queue if not verified and logged into within 24 hours of posting.

Does it mean, i need to let my server online, and allow this name and pass and ip?
or does it mean i need to log in?
